alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 1:02PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Seminole, northern Brevard, southeastern Orange, southeastern Volusia and northeastern Osceola Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 101 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Jessup to Chuluota to near Lake Hart. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Sanford, Titusville, Oviedo and Winter Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
